title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: South Park, school bus stop, morning. Stan, Cartman and Kenny wait for the bus. Stan is dressed in fishnet tank top, artsy pants, and a new, furry cap with the same colors as his old one. Cartman is dressed in a Madonna fashion shirt and artsy pants. His hair is tussled and brighter than usual. Kenny is dressed in a purple parka with light purple sleeves. A lock of his hair peeks out from under the hood.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Oh my God, you guys are not gonna believe what happened to me last night.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: What? Tell us?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: So, I'm watching the season premiere of Boy Meets Boy on television, and then Queer Eye for the Straight Guy come on, right? So I fall asleep in front of the TV, and when I wake up, I see that I've spilled the Coke I was drinking all over my satin pajama top.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Oh my Gosh, are you serious? That was the cutest top ever!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: I know!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: (I just LOVE this jacket 'cause it's SOOO beautiful!)

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Oh, tell me about it, Ken doll.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Hey dudes.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: What a dork!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: What?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Nice jacket, Kyle! Polyester is really the hot fabric this fall!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Well, but, this is the jacket I always wear.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: You've gotta get with the times, girlfriend.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Yeah, that jacket is so September 10th.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Oohh my God, you got splotches on your neck. Are you using any exfoliating products at all??

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: We can't let Kyle out in public like this, you guys.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: (That's the truth.)

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Come on, Kyle! We're giving you a makeover!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: MONTAGE The boys take Kyle to a clothing store and give him some suits to try out. They choose an outfit and haul him off to the next store, a barbershop. A woman styles Kyle's hair. Next is a pedicure. Kyle wears the outfit Kenny chose. Next stop: Forever 16, and finally Marcy's. Next, all four of them are getting facials. The last scene is of the four boys walking down the middle of the street, all dressed in new clothes. Cartman takes off his shades and the camera enters his eye

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: You... came into my life... and my world never looked so bright. Yeah.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
role: It's true. You bring out the best in me.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
role: When you are around, when you are around, all things just keep
text: getting better.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
role: It keeps getting better. Life keeps getting better and better
text: (All things just keep getting better).

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: The Broflovski house. Gerald and Sheila watch TV from their couch

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Coming up on HBC, it's Queer Eye for the Staight Guy!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: We have got to get you some tighter-fitting shirts!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Then it's Boy Meets Boy, followed by Will and Grace, and then, the Love Boat... with Men.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: My goodness, there certainly are a lot of gay shows on television these days.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Yeah. I think it's great that gays are finally being so accepted.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Hi Mom, Hi Dad!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: HAAAAAA!!!  Kyle! What's happened to you??

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: I'm just trying to fit in, Daddy. Don't be such a drama queen!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Oh my God! Come on, Sheila!  We'd better go tell the other parents what's going on!!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: The Marsh house. Gerald is pounding on the front door and Sharon answers.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Oh hi Gerald, Sheila.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Hi Sharon. Uh, we need to talk to you about the boys.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Sure. Come on in. The guys are all watching TV.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Oh, is the game on or something?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Heeey Geraaald! How are youuuu!!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Geraaald! Hi Gerald.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Sit down, Jer-Jer! Queer Eye For the Straight Guy is on.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Oh no! Y-you guys all turned gay too??

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Not gay, Gerald, metrosexual.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: What's that?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Just because a guy cares about how he looks and is in touch with his feminine side doesn't mean he's gay anymore.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Yeah. Metrosexual means you're straight, but you appreciate the gay culture.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: It's super-fabulous. Would you like some shirazz?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: The ladies look on from the kitchen

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Don't our men look

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Haven't you seen Quuer Eye For the Straight Guy, Sheila? These five gay men go around and show straight men how to better themselves. It's the best.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: It is?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Well sure, Sheila. Our husbands are all so clean and neat. My Randy irons his clothes and even has pedicures.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: And they like to talk about their feeling now and drink wine and decorate the house.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: My Steven shaved his chest and his balls. OOOO, I love it!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: And how about our boys, huh? Ever since gay culture became cool, our boys bathe every night and brush their teeth three times a day. This is the greatest thing ever.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: I don't know. Sometimes boys take cultural fads too far...

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: South Park, day. The boys go to school in their new threads. They stop at the main entrance

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Dude, I can't wait for Wendy to see how gay I look!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: That's true, you guys. When the chicks at school see how gay we are, they're gonna be all over us.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: (Woohoo!!)

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: All right. Let's work it!  What the...?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Tootaloo, Connor. See ya after classies.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Okay, sweetums.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Oh my God, where is my homework?! I am fr-eaking a-out!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Hey dudes.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Hey Craig.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: You guys look pretty gay.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Thanks.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Not as gay as us, though.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Oh, please Craig, we're ten times gayer than you!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Oh yeah?! We're superduper triple-dog gay!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Oh yeah?! We're all just super stamp it stamp it no erasies mega gay!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: What's all this fightin' about, children?!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: These guys are trying to say they're gayer than us!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Aw nah. Don't tell me you children have taken up this whole metrosexual fad, too!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Oh My God, this is not a fad, this is who we are!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: No it isn't. Last year you children were all trying to be black, and now you're trying to be gay!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: We're metrosexual!!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Maybe. But you'll never be as metrosexual as us! Come on, fags!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: GOD I HATE CRAIG!!  That son of a... djah!!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Chef, I don't feel very metrosexual.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Well, then, don't buy into this fad, Kyle. Be who you are, not what's cool.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: All right children, let's take our seats.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Good morning Mr. Garrison.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Well, uh d-don't you all look nice.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Oooo, Timmy.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Dude! W-what are you doing?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: I didn't feel comfortable in that stuff, dude. I'm just being me.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: HA! Told you you guys were straight!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: We're not straight! You're straight!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: You're straight like a freedway!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: What the hell is going on??

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: You wish you were gay, Craig! In you dreams!!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: I'm not just gay, I'm a catamite.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: ...So? I'm half bisexual!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Oh, stop it!! You kids don't even know what you're talking about!! Eric, you're not half-bi!!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: I'm like, a quarter-bi. My grandpa was bi, so that makes me quarter-bi.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: WHAT??

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Nighttime. Mr. Garrison and Mr. Slave walk down the street.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: It was the crazies thing I've ever seen, Mr. Slave. All the children were suddenly acting like being gay was cool. I mean, maybe we're not the only gay couple in town anymore.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Oh, Jethuth Chritht.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: The bar, inside. Disco music is playing. Mr. Garrison looks in awe at the metrosexuals now milling about.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Look at that, Mr. Slave.  Our cup runneth over.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Jethuth Chritht.

text: Mr. Garrison, those are great pants.

text: Thanks, Jimbo. I really like your outfit, too.  Soho... so Jimbo, you... wanna come back to my place with me and Mr. Slave?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Uh, for what?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Well, you know...

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: No.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Huh.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Mr. Garrison!  Hey doll.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Oh hey Randy.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: You're looking ultra-fabulous.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Wull thanks. You too.  So uh, Randy, you want me to give you a hand job in the bathroom?

text: Nuno, thanks, I'm, I'm not like that.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Not, not like that?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Uh-OH, thanks, Mr. Tweek.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: My pleasure, silly-buns.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Oh, wuh, welluh, Mr. Tweek, why don't we uh, go back to my place.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Why?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Well, you know, I was just thinking we could... put on some music and watch videos and pound Mr. Slave's tight little ass.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Woohoohoohoo, Jethuth Chritht.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Wohohoho, goodness no. I, I'm straight.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Straight? Bu-uh, Oh what... Jesus, what the hell is goin' on here?!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Huh?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Well, we don't "pound butt," Mr. Garrison, we're straight.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Those pants and those shoes say you pound butt!!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Heeey, now that's not true. My shoes don't say I pound butt.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: No, your shoes say you take it in the butt!!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: 'Sokay, Mr. Garrison. We learned that gays are totally cool. You're just one of us now.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Yeah.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: One of you?!  We've spent our whole lives tryin' NOT to be one of you! You can't do this to us!!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: South Park Elementary, playground, day

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Have you guys seen this? It's a conditioner that you can leave in, and it detoxifies the scalp.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Yeah. It's a charcoal-based thing that-

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Hey guys. You wanna throw the football around?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Guys, can I talk to you over here for a second?  Look, guys, a lot of the kids in school are talking, okay? And they're spreading rumors that we're not metrosexuals because... we hang out with Kyle.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Well, what can we do about it?

text: We have no choice, you guys. We're just gonna have to kill Kyle.

text: What?? That's stupid. We wouldn't have to kill Kyle! We would just to tell him not to hang around us anymore.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Oh, you know, you're right, Stan. We just have to tell Kyle not to hang around us anymore.

text: Yeah. Wait, what?

text: You hear that, Kenny? Stan thinks we should tell Kyle not to hang around us anymore. I think he's right. Good luck telling him, Stan. I... know it won't be easy.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Hey, butch boy. Nice football you got there.

text: Stan?

text: No! Ah!

text: The Broflovski house. Kyle returns with bruises all over his body. His mom is dusting

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Kyle! What happened to you?!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: I got beat up at school... for being different.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: GRRRRR!!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Now let's get down to the tango class and learn some new steps.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Chef's house, day. Mr. Garrison rings the bell

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Oh, hello, Mr. Garrison.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Chef, can I talk to you?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Sure. Come on in.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Thanks. Come, Slave.  Oh, it's just awful, Chef! I used to feel like an outsider, a totally different person who stood out in this town! Now every straight guy is acting gayer than me!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Oh Jethuth! Jethuth Chritht!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Well, what do you want me to do about it?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Chef, what did you do when white people stole your culture?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Oh. Well, we black people just always tried to stay out in front of them.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: How did you do that?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Well, like with our slang. Black people always used to say, "I'm in the house" instead of "I'm here." But then white people all started to say "in the house" so we switched it to "in the hizzouse." Hizzouse became hizzizzouse, and then white folk started saying that, and we had to change it to hizzie, then "in the hizzle" which we had to change to "hizzle fo shizzle," and now, because white people say "hizzle fo shizzle," we have to say "flippity floppity floop."

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: We don't have time for all that, Chef! Oh, if only those Queer Eye For the Straight Guy people understood what they were doing.  Wait.  That's it! I know exactly what to do!  Come on, Mr. Slave! Let's get back to our flippity floppity floop.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Oh no! Damnit! Don't call it that!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: South Park Train Station. Kyle approaches a ticket booth

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: One ticket to New York, please.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: I'm going to see the Queer Eye For the Straight Guy people.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Mrrh.  Mr. Garrison?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Did so! Did so!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: I thought of it yesterday!

text: Oh.  You're right, Mr. Slave. We can both kill them together.

text: Cool.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY

text: Hurry, you guys! The mall closes in seven hours! Oh, why can't we all live at the mall?!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: You know, I'm starting to think this whole metrosexual thing isn't so great.

text: I know what you mean. All my husband ever does now is look at himself in the mirror. He cares more about how he looks than how I look.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Unh, Jethuth  Chritht.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: You'd better shut up, Craig.

text: Everyone knows it's true!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Is so!

text: Craig! Behave yourself!

text: Dad, Craig is trying to say that his dad can outdress you!

text: Oh, stop it! Will you all just stop it?!  Look, you guys are carrying this fad too far! Will you please stop acting this way?!

text: You don't... like us being metrosexual?

text: Well, you know what I think? I think you're all metrophobic!

text: Yeah!!

text: We shouldn't be fighting amongst ourselves, we should be uniting against metrophobes like these!

text: Yeah Mom! We're proud of who we are.

text: That's right. Proud. You know what I think, guys? I think we should have a metrosexual pride parade.

text: (Woohoohoo!)

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Come on, fellas! Out of the malls and into the streets!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Out of the malls and into the streets! Out of the malls and into the streets! Out of the malls and into the streets!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: What the hell did that show do to them?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: HBC Television Headquarters, New York. Police have been called in and have apprehended Mr. Garrison, Mr. Slave, and Kyle

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: You sure you don't want to press charges?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: That's okay, officer. I think they learned murder is wrong.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Especially in those pants.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Look, guys, we're sorry we tried to murder you, but... You have to stop what you're doing!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Are you crazy?! We're the hottest thing on TV!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: But don't you see the price? You're selling out your own kind. Look, us gays have created a lifestyle, a, a culture that is uniquely ours. If we keep trying to make straight people into us, well, we're gonna have no identity left.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Sorry Charlie, no sale.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Buh... but... this doesn't make sense! How can gay men do this to their own people??  Unless... you're not gay at all...

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: You just had to push it, didn't you?!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Just had to keep asking question!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Now you know the truth!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: They aren't gay? Then what are they?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: We're a thousand years our kind have lived beneath the earth's crust! Banished by man in the Kindling Wars.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Oh my God.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: We are the Crab People!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: AAAAAAAAAAAAH!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Jethuth Chritht!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Craaab People! Craaab People! Craaab People!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: A subterranean cave. The crab people lead their hostages to their camp. "Craaab People! Craaab People! Craaab People!"

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: See now where we have been forced to live for a thousand years! But soon we shall rule the land above, and mankind will be gone!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Gone??

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Crab people are too small and weak to take over man by force, and so we came up with our perfect plan!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: If you can't beat man,  change man!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: I knew it! I knew gay people would never do this to their own kind!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: When all the world is metrosexual, the crab people shall finally reign supreme!!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Craaab People! Craaab People!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Taste like crab, talk like people.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Craaab People!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: You'll never turn ME into a metrosexual! I like being a dirty, filthy little boy!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Very well. If we can't make you into metrosexuals, then we will make you into crab people! Take them!!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: All things just keep getting better

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
role: and my world never looked so bright. Yeah.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
role: It's true. You bring out the best in me.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
role: When you are around, when you are around,

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
role: All things just keep getting better.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: South Park, day. A Metrosexual Pride Parade moves down the street in the background, and News 4 is covering it.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Tom, I'm standing in South Park, Colorado, where the first Metrosexual Pride Parade is underway!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: We're here!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: That does it! I can't take it anymore!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: We're here!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: I should have never wished for a cleaner, neater husband.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Ladies, get yoru things! I know what we have to do!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Whoa, look out!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Oh my God, it's on fire!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Put it out! Put it out!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: I can't do anything! These are brand-new pants!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: The heat could really damage our hair. We'd better let the police handle this!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Are you crazy? I just had my uniform pressed!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Oh Jesus, it's burning! Oh my God!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Eeeek!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Put it out! Put it out! Fire!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: HBC Headquarters, New York. The Queer Eye guys work on President Bush on their show

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Mr. President, it is such an honor to make you over!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Now, we've got to do something with yoru hair.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: And your nails are filthy. Let's get those clean.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: This is gay gold!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Stop them! They're crab people!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: They cannot see or hear us, foolish man. Now stand by and watch as your pitiful race becomes helplesss!!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: That is very good, Mr. President. Now, put on this silk jacket.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: No Mr. President!! Don't do it!  Help!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: You bastards!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: That looks great! Now, how about some moisturizer.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: There they are! Get 'em!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: What?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: You turned our husbands into whiny little wusses!!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: It's payback time!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Oh my God, what are they doing?!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Oh noooo!!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Wha? What have you done?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: We're sorry, but we didn't have a choice. You see, at first we liked having our men be clean and neat. We thought that having them use product in their hair and wanting facials would make them sexier. But it doesn't.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: That's right. Event though my Steven sickens me out sometimes, it's his rugged manly grossness that I'm attracted to.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: We're sorry, but we knew that the only answer was tuh kill the Queer Eye guys.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Well you're going to jail for thi-! Wait a minute.  What is that?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: No! Our evil plans! Noooo...

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Oh my God. They were crab people.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Yes! They were tryingn to systematically make men into wusses so they could take over the world!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Mom!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Kyle!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: I should have known they were crab people. They tried this before with The Jefferson.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: So now, can you please change your network's programming?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Yes. Yes, I think this gay fad is over. Gentlemen, back to Studio 12! We're gonna bring back the Latin fad.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: South Park. The sign has been redrawn with a barrio graffiti font.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: The McCormick house, day. Randy, Jimbo, Skeeter, and Stuart are now dressed as cholos on the porch. Two six-packs of Coronas are on the ground. Some of the bottles are already empty

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Hey eses.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Hey Jefey. You want some cerveiza?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: South Park Elememtary, day. Kyle walks into view in the school hall

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Kyle. Hey, ese. You wanna come play catch with us?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: What? Y-you want me to hang out with you?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Yeah. It's cool, holmes.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: ...No, dude, it really isn't cool. You all turned yoru backs on me. You're supposed to be my best friends and you just... treated me like nothing! And now you all expect me to just forget it all and, and hang out with you again like nothing happened?

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Aw Jesus, Kyle, don't be such a whiny little gaywad! Come play catch with us.

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: Yeah, don't be such a fag, dude!

title: SOUTH PARK IS GAY
text: God-damnit!
